Portfolio About me

About me

My name is Kirill

I was born in Ukraine, but now I live in the USA, California, Los Angeles. I speak 3 languages. Ukrainian, Russian and English. I have been interested in programming since I was 15, but started learning seriously at the age of 16. I have skills such as HTML, CSS, SASS, SCSS, Responsive web pages, Bootstrap, BEM, CSS Flex, CSS Grid, JavaScript, APIs, Requests, React. I always try to do my job beautifully and correctly, I like to learn new things and constantly improve my skills.
Web-development
I love creating beautiful and responsive websites. SPA Development(Single Page Application)
Application Development
I create websites for computers and phones, various browser games and tasks (such as TicTacToe, ToDo lists, Weather Information)
Preprocessors
I know how to use the SASS preprocessor ( SCSS ) in the project and every time I strengthen my knowledge of this technology. Structure, Variables, Mixins, abbreviated syntax, &.
JavaScript
JavaScript is my favorite programming language. I repeat over and over the information I learned. Algorithms, CodeWars, and every time I improve them through theory and practice.
Team Work and Soft Skills
I am a very friendly and sociable person. I always help people and ask them to help me if I can't cope with something. I support my colleagues and friends! Teamwork is very important.
